snippet.title: Bardic: Quest for Love | Trailer #1 (Kickstarter)
snippet.description:
We're swapping back to kickstarter, sorry for the headache ;w;
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/breadworkgames/bardic-quest-for-love

Bardic: Quest for Love, an Adventure / Dating Sim game based in a Medieval Fantasy Setting, inspired by traditional TTRPGs of that nature. Our game features compelling dialogue, choices that affect the narrative, skill checks to succeed or fail in certain situations, and the end goal of choosing a fellow Adventuring Hero to pursue romance with.

Our Itch.io Page!
https://breadworkgames.itch.io/bardic-quest-for-love

Our Kickstarter Page!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/breadworkgames/bardic-quest-for-love
